CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Solara Sugarbeet relative to Zephyr Cotton?
SRP.A: Solara Sugarbeet is {above} Zephyr Cotton in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Solara Sugarbeet relative to GeoNuts?
SRP.A: Solara Sugarbeet is {below} GeoNuts in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Zephyr Cotton relative to Solara Sugarbeet?
SRP.A: Zephyr Cotton is {below} Solara Sugarbeet in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total fertilizer price?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {GeoNuts}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total fertilizer price?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Solara Sugarbeet}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Solara Sugarbeet's minimum Fertilizer Price in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Solara Sugarbeet's minimum Fertilizer Price is in {1987}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is GeoNuts's minimum Fertilizer Price in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: GeoNuts's minimum Fertilizer Price is in {1976}.

NC.Q: Was the total Fertilizer Price in 1976 higher or lower than in 1984?
NC.A: The total fertilizer price in 1976 was {higher} than in 1984.

NC.Q: Was the total Fertilizer Price in 1976 higher or lower than in 1989?
NC.A: The total fertilizer price in 1976 was {higher} than in 1989.

NC.Q: Was the total Fertilizer Price in 1978 higher or lower than in 1993?
NC.A: The total fertilizer price in 1978 was {higher} than in 1993.

NC.Q: Was the total Fertilizer Price in 1977 higher or lower than in 1986?
NC.A: The total fertilizer price in 1977 was {higher} than in 1986.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {GeoNuts} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Solara Sugarbeet and Zephyr Cotton first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Solara Sugarbeet and Zephyr Cotton first exchanged leading positions in {1979}.
